content:
Šo gan laikam kartē nezīmēsim, nebūs īpaši ilgmūžīgs - kaut arī liels :)

https://eng.lsm.lv/article/culture/culture/26.02.2025-flow-cat-ice-skates-in-adazi-latvia.a589338/?utm_source=mastodon

'Flow' cat ice skates in Ādaži, Latvia
A Latvian couple's artwork on ice has gained popularity on the internet and social networks. Using snow shovels to clear the ice of snow, the husband and wife have created an impressively large image...
